about_the_game:
DIY MY GIRL (PC version) is a creative game that combines AI and VR technology. Because it allows players to choose the gender, age, and dress of their characters in VR, they can also add new anime characters, or use AI technology to upload their own photos and customize their favorite avatars. In addition, it has a rich resource library and interactive mode to release the creativity of players.

1. Customize a personalized girl

Players can customize a cute girl avatar in VR and upload photos from their computers to generate faces of their choice. The AI ​​technology used in this game ensures that players upload a complete copy of the photos.
Players can also choose the original avatar that comes with the system, or add favorite anime avatars, or even change the gender of the girl. These functions are in the right menu bar as shown in the figure below.

Players can match girls with suitable hairstyles on this page.

Players can adjust many details of the avatar. As shown in the picture below, players can not only change the appropriate hairstyle for their avatar, but also adjust the color of the hair.

All head designs customized by the player will be stored in the VR 3D menu. Players can drag any head from this menu to their girl avatar for easy access.

Players can choose clothes for their girl portrait.

2. Let's start dancing
Players can choose the action of the girl's avatar. The game provides a library of more than 200 daily actions and 60 groups of dance actions for players to set combinations.

3. Interactive games
The player can interact with the girl's avatar, as shown in the following example. They can choose to throw a ball at the girl, shoot a water gun, or set off fireworks through the function keys on the right side of the game page, and their girl portrait will respond accordingly. During the game, her emotions towards the player will change, and she will respond differently according to her preferences.

The player's reaction to the girl after she fired a water gun

The player's reaction after throwing a ball at the girl

Firework stick

Fireworks that bloom after the launch of the firework stick

This is a DIY game full of creativity and interactive fun. Players have a lot of maneuverable spaces in it to give full play to their creativity.
At the same time, watching the girl's reaction in the interaction is full of unknown interest. It is a very casual and relaxing game. The rich costume resources of the game library are also very suitable for players who want to have their own design characters.

name: DIY MY LADY - DIY Queen of the Ocean (PC)

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy DIY MY LADY - DIY Queen of the Ocean (PC)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Pentium G4560 / AMD FX 8300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: NVIDIA High Definition Audio
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 or higher
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: NVIDIA High Definition Audio

short_description: DIY MY GIRL (PC version) is a creative game that combines AI and VR technology. Because it allows players to choose the gender, age, and dress of their characters in VR, they can also add new anime characters, or use AI technology to upload their own photos and customize their favorite avatars.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Turkish, Japanese, Polish, Thai, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese - Portugal, Arabic, Korean
